item.title: Report X-2024071283
item.description:
Report X-2024071283

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-22T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-17
  • City: SANTA FE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF stated he is at a customers location (Santa Fe ski company) and noticed a small leak dripping from the trailer onto the dirt where he is parked. ABF stated freight was not properly blocked and braced and caused a small puncture to one of the drums.
